mapper.select: SELECT DomainDataID AS "DomainDataID" ,DomainDataName AS "DomainDataName" ,ProcessID AS "ProcessID" ,DomainDataContext AS "DomainDataContext" FROM ( SELECT DomainDataID ,DomainDataName ,ProcessID ,DomainDataContext FROM JWF_DOMAINDATA WHERE ProcessID = #{ProcessID} ) A

SELECT A.FileID AS "FileID" , A.StorageID AS "StorageID" , A.ServiceType AS "ServiceType" , A.ObjectID AS "ObjectID" , A.ObjectType AS "ObjectType" , A.MessageID AS "MessageID" , A.Version AS "Version" , A.SaveType AS "SaveType" , A.LastSeq AS "LastSeq" , A.Seq AS "Seq" , A.FilePath AS "FilePath" , A.FileName AS "FileName" , A.SavedName AS "SavedName" , A.Size_ AS "Size" , A.ThumWidth AS "ThumWidth" , A.ThumHeight AS "ThumHeight" , A.Description AS "Description" , A.RegistDate AS "RegistDate" , B.DisplayName || ' (' || C.DeptName || ')' AS UserName , ROWNUM AS "Num" FROM SYS_FILE A INNER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER B ON B.UserCode = A.RegisterCode INNER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP C ON C.UserCode = B.UserCode WHERE MessageID = #{FormInstID} AND A.ServiceType = #{ServiceType} AND A.SaveType != 'INLINE' AND C.JobType = 'Origin'
ORDER BY
FileName UserName FileID
ASC DESC

SELECT A.DocReadID AS "DocReadID" , A.UserID AS "UserID" , A.JobTitle AS "JobTitle" , A.JobLevel AS "JobLevel" , TO_CHAR(A.ReadDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "ReadDate" , A.ProcessID AS "ProcessID" , A.FormInstID AS "FormInstID" , A.AdminYN AS "AdminYN" , B.MultiDisplayName AS "UserName" , C.MultiDeptName AS "DeptName" FROM JWF_DOCREADHISTORY A INNER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER B ON B.UserCode = A.UserID INNER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP C ON C.UserCode = B.UserCode
WHERE FormInstID = #{FormInstID}
WHERE ProcessID = #{ProcessID}
AND C.JobType = 'Origin' AND A.AdminYN = 'N'
ORDER BY
UserName ReadDate
ASC DESC
